DOC.brief_summary: The aim trial study possible mechanism pain reduce effect CT peripheral venipuncture
DOC.criteria: 1 . Male volunteer age 2040 year , height 165190 cm . 2 . Physical status I accord American Society Anesthesiologists ( ASA ) classification . 3 . Straight run vein dorsum nondominant hand least 4 cm long 3 mm thick 4 . No analgesic , anticoagulant and/or antiplatelet agent , sedative alcohol 1 . History peripheral neuropathy 2 . Abnormal skin condition ( infection , scar , psoriasis , eczema ) 3 . Unsuccessful venipuncture 4 . Inflamed site VP within 1 week VP
